      public <T extends AbstractManager> T getManager​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Retrieves a manager from the list. If the manager does not exist one will be created, added to the list and returned
      Parameters:
      type - The class type (ie SoundManager.class)
      Returns:
      A Manager component of the requested type

    • getManagerFromInstance

      public static <T extends AbstractManager> T getManagerFromInstance​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
